overview: Mid-level gangster Wah falls in love with his beautiful cousin, but must also continue to protect his volatile partner-in-crime and friend, Fly.
title: As Tears Go By

results.name: As Tears Go By (1988) Original Trailer [FHD]

wikipedia_summary:
As Tears Go By may refer to:

As Tears Go By (film), a 1988 Hong Kong film
"As Tears Go By" (song), a mid-1960s popular song written by Mick Jagger, Keith Richards and Andrew Loog Oldham that was a hit recording for The Rolling Stones and Marianne Faithfull
wikipedia_full_html:
As Tears Go By may refer to:

  • As Tears Go By (film), a 1988 Hong Kong film
  • "As Tears Go By" (song), a mid-1960s popular song written by Mick Jagger, Keith Richards and Andrew Loog Oldham that was a hit recording for The Rolling Stones and Marianne Faithfull
